name: Last One Left (indieretrogames)
description:
You play a hen-pecked husband who must buy three eggs for your wife so she can bake a cake.

Trouble is, the town is recovering from lockdown and the shops are low on stock. Even if each shop has only the Last One Left, you must purchase them all before they go! No shoppers can be allowed to obstruct you! No security goons can block your path!

Your marriage to your overbearing wife hangs in the balance!

From the developer who brought you: AI Anomaly, Someone Cloned The President, Freedom! Do or Die, Pension Day and Dickie A Cumming (all available on Steam).
